flavor_text_entries.black:
When its body dries out, it weakens.
So, to prevent dehydration, it wraps
itself in many layers of thin membrane.
flavor_text_entries.white:
Having removed its heavy shell,
it becomes very light and can fight
with ninja-like movements.
flavor_text_entries.black-2:
When its body dries out, it weakens.
So it wraps a membrane around itself
for protection while it spits poison.
flavor_text_entries.white-2:
When its body dries out, it weakens.
So it wraps a membrane around itself
for protection while it spits poison.
flavor_text_entries.x:
Having removed its heavy shell, it becomes very
light and can fight with ninja-like movements.
flavor_text_entries.y:
When its body dries out, it weakens. So, to prevent

thin membrane.
flavor_text_entries.omega-ruby:
Having removed its heavy shell, it becomes very
light and can fight with ninja-like movements.
flavor_text_entries.alpha-sapphire:
When its body dries out, it weakens. So, to prevent
dehydration, it wraps itself in many layers of

flavor_text_entries.sword:
It moves with blinding speed and lobs poison at
foes. Featuring Accelgor as a main character is
a surefire way to make a movie or comic popular.
flavor_text_entries.shield:
Discarding its shell made it nimble. To keep
itself from dehydrating, it wraps its body in
bands of membrane.
